headline: Fox News Abandons the GOP on Russia
author: David Frum
sentences:
Eric Greitens—the disgraced former governor of Missouri now running for the Republican nomination in the U.S. Senate race there—has issued vividly inflammatory statements against aid to Ukraine as “the war mongering of DC elites.”
Conversely, some conservative talking heads have embraced the politicians’ pro-Ukraine position.
